source: ATLAS H→invisible (VBF) BRinv<0.145 @95%CL (JHEP 08 (2022) 104) + ΓH^SM≈4.07 MeV (ATLAS materials); μ=1.023^{+0.056}_{-0.053} (ATLAS-CONF-2025-006).
note: Invisible width derived assuming only new contribution is invisible partial width: Γ_inv < (BR_inv/(1-BR_inv)) × Γ_H^SM. Signal strength deviation is conservative 2σ cap from μ=1.023^{+0.056}_{-0.053}.
